/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Street lamps and traffic lights punctuate the scene, indicating a well-lit and organized cityscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, suggesting a bustling city life. In the distance, the iconic CCTV Tower stands tall, its silhouette unmistakable against the overcast sky. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the blend of urban development and natural elements. Despite the overcast sky, the image exudes a calm and serene atmosphere.
